body: Hi im having prolbems connecting to the server and so is my brother so i was wondering if theres something going on . (Im from England and normally the server works fine).
body_tagged: Hi im having prolbems connecting to the server and so is my brother so i was wondering if theres something going on . (Im from England and normally the server works fine).
title: Is the server running ok ?

replies.body: Does your brother share the same wifi network as you? check your connection. just because your brother can't connect doesn't mean anything. (Unless he's at college or something)
replies.body_tagged: Does your brother share the same wifi network as you? check your connection. just because your brother can't connect doesn't mean anything. (Unless he's at college or something)

replies.body: It's been happening a lot over the past couple of days, but using direct IPs helps.

replies.body: I've had this happen to me a lot over the past few days. Try connecting with direct ip's such as mczone01.avic.us or luna.avic.us. I haven't had a connection problem while using these ip's, so hopefully you won't either. <3
